reviews.sentence: Great hotel close to everything. My son and I stayed at Oaks on Market whilst attending the Australian Open a birthday present for my tennis crazed teenager. To make my sons experience even more special we were upgraded to a room with a view and a King Bed on the 21st floor. The room was very spacious and had everything we needed. We did not cook but there were adequate facilities to do so if we had the inclination. It is a very short walk to Southbank and Flinders St station. there is also a myriad of shops nearby including a Subway open until 5 am and 7 Eleven. I would suggest asking for a room higher up as it could get noisy on the lower levels due to trains and general traffic. do not forget to ask reception for a towel for the indoor pool and spa as there are not any towels by the pool. The spa was set at 26 degrees a bit tepid for us but it was large and still enjoyable. The staff were courteous and helpful. Overall we had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend the hotel to others. Spacious convenient well priced great facilities. No suggestions. Great location. Walk to trams trains Southbank Collins St cafes etc.

Holiday. The hotel staff we great. we could leave our luggage before check in and there were no hassles with anything. It was a great home base for a week long holiday in Melbourne we walked everywhere inclduing the Vic market. However there was constuction noise in the early morning right across the street which made sleeping in beyong around 6 am hard and we were somewhat disappointed to discover that the spa pool is only 24 degrees not hot because it flows into the pool for some reason. The sauna is aweome though. Location Location great for central Melbourne. we walked everywhere. The bathtub could be bigger. The spa pool could have been hot. It would have been nice to know that there was a constuction site opposite the hotel.
Close to all the wonderful Melbourne must see sights. The spaciousness of the room. The temperature of the spa was too cold. 26 degrees is not a spa it is just a heated pool.

Basic. Location is central. Uncomfortable cheap furniture sofa very grim dark gloomy outlook office block poky pool spa area took one look but did not bother no safe in room. Generally fairly basic so would only recommend if price was right.

Comfortable stay. Good Location Clean Good Location. The restaurant bar at the hotel lobby was undergoing renovation during our stay but noise and dust was kept to the minimum so not much inconveniences caused. Has a swimming pool which was a tad busy so we did not try and a laundry room on the same floor as the pool. Did not try the room service but food looks good and are reasonably priced.
Very good. Walking distance to everything. Pool and spa are way too cold.

Excellent stay if you do not have a pram stroller. I liked the large layout of the rooms. Lots of room for the kids to crawl and play. The warm pool. Yummy room service. Not pram friendly at all. Steps up to the front of hotel with no rampthere is a wheel chair lift but that is not available for use by guests without staff assistance. so made it quite annoying when coming going with prams. Pool is lovely but could use more bench seating in the area also not accessible with pram stroller.
Very average stay. Good location. Undergoing refurbishment. Flashing light on smoke detector in room. No changing room for gym pool. Surcharge for credit card payment.

Booked for pool and in house massage. Pool freezing spa broken lift to pool broken no in room massage. As stated. This is why I chose Oaks. Coffee tea sugar milk had to go to desk and ask for also only 1 towel each no face washers house keeping need to do there jobs properly. Will not return here. Desk staff were excellent.

Good central location. Nice pool gym. Pleasant stay. Access to pool awkward. Bathrobes would be a nice addition when accessing pool area via lifts. Helpful cheery staff. Good choice of tapas type bar food. Pleasant decor and good facilities. Close to trams and taxis Robes for wearing between room and pool.
Great room quiet we had a great sleep in a comfy bed. Close to walk to everything. We really enjoyed the pool facilities as well.
Very Good. The pool facilities were great the room was spacious and staff were friendly.

Top CBD hotel for families. I have stayed at Oaks on Market numerous times midweek on weekends. It ticks many boxes for me as a business traveller visitor with family in tow. Pluses include Big rooms most with views. super quiet area beds super comfy with lotsa beding Foxtel Sports great value buffet breky lotsa of good boy bad boy choices gym swim options onsite bar restaurant is really god super helpful concierge staf fast room service proximity to Southbank CBD teams is great 10 all day parking nearbyMinuses include the pool jacuzi are freezing cold aircon fans in rooms noisy bucks dos drunks but we can not choose our neighbours can we. Overall this is a great value comfortable hotel where everyone is welcome.
Good. The kids loved the pool. The location was terificLevel 13 smelled like curry.

Melbourne family carchup. Xcelent location awesome facilities helpful hospitality staff food delicious and reasonable priced. Excellent Bar Care restaurant attached to hotel. Ebony was exceptional in her area of hospitality a real sweetie. Pool spa and gym excellent clean. We will stay again. Close to team in Collins street and also supermarkets within 500 mtrs. great spot. shame about weather.

Great for a weekend getaway. We loved our recent stay at the Oaks on Market. We were impressed by the fantastic level of service provided by all staff we encountered from Reception to the bar staff at Happy Hour to the staff in the restaurant. We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite which was very spacious in particular. the beds and pillows were A mazing. The pool sauna and fitness room were also really good and very clean. Breakfast was very good value and offered a great range of choices. We had a late flight and were pleased to get a late check out of 5 pm for a really reasonable fee. The hotel is in a great location it is just a 2 minute walk to Flinders St for trams or just a bit further on to Southbank and Crown Casino. We d certainly stay there again.

Weekend away for Foty and Shopping. A nice 10 minute walk to Crown Casino room was quiet and spacious and the bed was oh so comfy. great sized bathroom. We used the Spa and Pool which was great and had breakfast in the morning great selection of food to choose from Staff were friendly and helpful.

3 night stay. Highly recommend OAKS on MarketPol sauna and relaxation pool were magnificent. Excellent locationGreat sized romsGreat variety at the buffet breakfast Very comfy big bed. movie channels a bonus.

Excellent pool but spa is difficult to enter and exit for older people. An extra step is required. Room service meals were good although we were delayed because we had only one fork in room. When we we arrived the fridge was not working properly and there was no ice. After we turned the dial it came good. The Microwave oven requires use of a university degree to master the instructions which should be written and placed in an obvious spot. Good TV 2 and availability of Foxtel channels. The dona was too small for the bed and had no cover on it. Very pleasant and welcoming staff. A ramp should be placed down the front steps on one side to allow bags to be carted up. Convenient and economic car parking. On the whole very agreeable and we will return.

So comfortable clean and easy. Clean quiet comfortable beds pillows friendly front counter staff. Room temperature good. Easily organised and would stay again. Pool clean nice to unwind. Close to trams stored bags after checkout for us. Sitting area with extras water fruit.
